content.title: Grow plants in space
content.body1: You have found the sensing and control platform powering AstroPlant. This is an open source platform that you can use to configure and run hardware-based industrial control systems and conduct experiments. The control system can run on low-power devices such as the Raspberry Pi and communicates with various types of sensors and actuators, either wired or wirelessly.
content.body2: AstroPlant is an educational citizen science project in cooporation with the European Space Agency to engage a new generation of space farmers, collect data and ideas for agriculture on Mars, develop open source research equipment, and create awareness of regenerative and closed-loop agricultural systems.
content.body3: We have built a prototype plant lab that collects and shares open data about plant growth in different growth environments and are working on an open lab-infrastructure that makes it possible for everyone to contribute to science and space explorationâ€”and to get to know more about topics such as plant science and biology, space science, engineering, electronics, open innovation and the circular economy.

see.body: See the Astroplant kits in the world.

learn.body: Learn about growing plants and AstroPlant.

kit.privacyShowOnMap: Show the kit's location on the public map
kit.noActiveConfiguration: This kit has no active configuration

notFound.body: Sorry, the kit with serial <1>{{serial}}</1> could not be found.

notAuthorized.body: Sorry, you are not authorized to access kit with serial <1>{{serial}}</1>. Please ensure you are logged in with the correct account.

peripherals.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you wish to delete this peripheral? Any rules associated with this peripheral will also be deleted.

kitConfiguration.deactivateConfirm: Are you sure you wish to deactivate configuration {{configurationDescription}} of kit {{kitName}}?
kitConfiguration.activateConfirmNeverUsed: Are you sure you wish to activate configuration {{configurationDescription}} of kit {{kitName}}? You will no longer be able to change this configuration after activating it. If any other configuration is active, that one will be deactivated.
kitConfiguration.activateConfirm: Are you sure you wish to activate configuration {{configurationDescription}} of kit {{kitName}}? If any other configuration is active, that one will be deactivated.

kitAccess.resetPasswordConfirm: Are you sure you wish to reset the password of kit {{kitName}}? Your kit will be unable to connect until you update the credentials on the kit.
kitAccess.deleteKitConfirm: Are you sure you wish to delete kit {{kitName}}? This will permanently delete all data associated with the kit, including measurements and media. This cannot be undone.

control.explanation: These rules configure the fuzzy control system on the kit. Setpoints are used to calculate errors or deviation from midpoints. These errors or deviations are used in fuzzy logic statements to control output. This results in gradual, continuous control signals.

invalidParameter.alreadyExists: already exists and must be unique
invalidParameter.unexpected: invalid for an unknown or unexpected reason
